org.pipservices.runtime.clients

Class DirectClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pipservices.runtime.AbstractComponent
      • org.pipservices.runtime.clients.AbstractClient
        • org.pipservices.runtime.clients.DirectClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClient, IComponent

    public class DirectClient
extends AbstractClient
    Direct client implementation that allows to call another microservice from the same container. It can be very useful for deployments of microservices as monolithic systems. Although it may seem strange some situation may require deployment simplicity over scalability and other benefits of microservices. The good news, you have flexibility to adapt the end product without sacrificing the system architecture.
    Since:
    2016-06-09
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergey Seroukhov
